title: GTA Online
headline: GTA Online
subtitle: Get Bonuses With Career Progress Challenges
content:
Your tenacity in fending off attacks, salvaging scrap, and more in A Superyacht Life missions will also pay off as you scale the Career Progress tiers, collecting maritime-themed rewards along the way.

These include the Captain Cap just for getting started in Tier 1 by completing any A Superyacht Life mission, all the way up to the A Superyacht Life Hoodie for besting the more arduous undertakings in Tier 4.
